ARABIC: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We raised up other generations after them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then after them We raised other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then, after them, We brought forth other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: After them We brought another generation into existence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then after them, We created other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, after them, We created other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We raised after them other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thereafter, after them, We produced other generations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then after them We brought forth other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We raised up other generations after them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then after them We brought forth other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then after them We brought forth other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We raised after them other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, after them, We created other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: After them We produced other generations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, after them, We raised other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We produced after them other generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:42] Then, after them, We brought forth other generations, [other] peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then after them) then after their destruction (We brought forth other generations) from generation to generation.
